name: HerokuBanBypass-Deployer
description: With this you can deploy Repos that are banned/blacklisted by Heroku.

OTHER_INSTALLS.description: If you need install packages for running your app, fill with space in between each package.Get them from the requirements file of the repo you want to deploy

REPO_URL.description: Enter the repository link that you want to deploy

PYTHON_FILE.description: Name of the python file that you need to run [use -m if you need to run __main__.py from a folder]

OTHER_CMD.description: If you need to run any bash command other than python specify here
